page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: There are many different aspects of school education in this area today. The pupils come from a variety of economic backgrounds although comparatively there are no pupils very poor or very rich. Our school is a very modern building with good educational facilities. The rooms are large enough to take the tables, chairs and pupils, although the colour schemes are very dull and grey. we are lucky enough to have carpets in the classrooms and along most corridors. Sports facilities are excellent and music is very good too. The curriculum includes all of the important subjects like Maths, English, Humanities and Sciences. We also do Religious Studies I think this subject ought to be taught because we not only learn about the Christian faith but other religions too.
